channel.title: MakeFile on Edward Leung
channel.description: Recent content in MakeFile on Edward Leung

item.title: C Shell
item.description: A C shell for Linux created as a project for an Operating Systems course. Shell support background executions using multithreading it also supports piping into .txt files. A list of commands can be found on the github page. A make file is included in the project to help complie and run the program.
